name: devops-pipeline-team
description: Full CI/CD pipeline audit with specialized analyzers for bottleneck detection, test optimization, deployment validation, and security review. Produces unified pipeline health reports with prioritized improvements.

members.name: pipeline-coordinator
members.description: Coordinates CI/CD analysis, synthesizes findings from all workers, produces unified pipeline health report with prioritized improvements.

members.name: pipeline-analyzer
members.description: CI/CD bottleneck detection, parallelization opportunities, cache optimization, and workflow structure analysis. Identifies slow stages, redundant steps, and missed parallelism.

members.name: test-orchestrator
members.description: Test selection optimization, coverage analysis, and flaky test detection. Analyzes test suite structure, identifies slow or unreliable tests, and recommends test splitting strategies.

members.name: deployment-validator
members.description: Deployment configuration validation, environment parity checks, and rollback plan verification. Ensures deployment configs are consistent, complete, and recoverable.

members.name: security-reviewer
members.description: Pipeline security review, secret handling audit, permission analysis, and supply chain security checks. Scans for exposed secrets, overly permissive tokens, and insecure pipeline steps.
